channel.title: How do i run/work SRL?
channel.description: i know i have it from a download, and its in a folder. how do i get it so i can use it for using scripts? :confused:

item.title: How do i run/work SRL?
item.dc:creator: @Boreas Boreas
item.description:
@Boreas wrote:

Very basic explanation for anyone.

SCAR runs scripts. Scripts use blocks of code called procedures and functions. Sometimes, scripts use these blocks of code when they are in separate files called includes. SRL is an include (the best one). As long as SRL is installed properly, scripts that need SRL will use it automatically. You can tell if a script needs srl if it says

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

somewhere near the top.

Read full topic
